# vtb_user_data (Data Source)

Core/memory of compute instance

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "vtb_user_data" "shemakov" {
    query_string = "vtb70177758"
    domain       = "test.vtb.ru"
}

data "vtb_user_data" "kurushkina" {
    query_string = "vtb70165094"
    domain       = "test.vtb.ru"
}
```

### Required

- `domain` (String)
- `query_string` (String)

- `name` (String)

- `username` (String)
